abstract: Independent Police Review Authority recommends firing of Dante Servin, Chicago officer who shot and killed unarmed woman Rekia Boyd in 2012.
lead_paragraph: The Chicago police say a review board that examines allegations of police misconduct has recommended that an officer who shot and killed an unarmed woman in 2012 be fired.

headline.main: Illinois: Board Says Police Officer Who Killed Woman Should Be Fired
headline.print_headline: Illinois: Board Says Police Officer Who Killed Woman Should Be Fired

snippet: The Chicago police say a review board that examines allegations of police misconduct has recommended that an officer who shot and killed an unarmed woman in 2012 be fired.
